Articles.Content:
Greetings everyone,

Ive been playing KSP since it first was available on early access on Steam. On and off that is and i noticed that there are alot of new things in the latest version. Like most people i thought getting into orbit was a pain, hehe.

I wonder will we see MP in KSP and the possibility of alien discovery in any scence?

Best Regards

Tinker\_Man

Connection terminated...

-Connection established-

Welcome aboard! As the saying goes, "Once you're in orbit, you're halfway to anywhere."

Rock on, fly safe!

-Connection Terminated-

Welcome, Tinker\_man!

MP has been promised for future updates after 1.0 is released. They've been working on it for a while, but it's an enormous project. I wouldn't expect to see it for quite a while yet.

Happy landings!

Yep, I agree. There is discussion of Muliplayer (though I don't know if it's a "promise" quite yet). However, I don't think we will be seeing any other aliens (besides Kerbals) any time soon, if ever...

Welcome to the forums! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Cheers,

~Claw

Welcome!

Aliens are not planned:

[http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Planned_features](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Planned_features)

(Scroll down to not planned or shelved)

Tinker, you are in the right spot. KSP is excelente for tinkers.

And crazy ones too. All sort of people here, trying to have fun putting little greenies into al sort of missions.

Take your place and enjoy!

Welcome!
